Body:
tape = TapeCallbackFunction()
pickle_checkpoint_step = DefaultCheckpoint()
pipeline_save = create_pipeline(tmpdir=tmpdir, pickle_checkpoint_step=
    Identity(), tape=TapeCallbackFunction(), hyperparameters=
    HyperparameterSamples({'a__learning_rate': 1}), different=True,
    save_pipeline=False)
pipeline_save.fit_transform(data_inputs, expected_outputs)
pipeline_load = create_pipeline(tmpdir=tmpdir, pickle_checkpoint_step=
    pickle_checkpoint_step, tape=tape, hyperparameters=
    HyperparameterSamples({'a__learning_rate': 1}))
pipeline_load, actual_data_inputs = pipeline_load.fit_transform(data_inputs,
    expected_outputs)
actual_tape = tape.get_name_tape()
assert np.array_equal(actual_data_inputs, data_inputs)
assert actual_tape == ['1', '2', '3']
